item.description:
Join us for huge portions of authentic Northeastern Brazilian cuisine at reasonable prices. This is also a great opportunity to practice your Portuguese.

Muqueca Restaurant is located in the charming neighborhood of Inman Square, less than a thirty minute walk from the major universities. It has a small family-style ambiance offering an authentic menu from the region of Espirito Santo, where seafood such as fish and shrimp flavored with cilantro, annatto seeds, and olive oil are cooked with the freshest and purest ingredients in a huge clay pot.

Here's a link with the Muqueca menu.

 

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE YOU MUST ANSWER THE QUESTIONS WHICH APPEAR AFTER YOU RSVP YES or WAIT LIST. 
IF YOU RSVP NO YOU DO NOT NEED TO ANSWER THE QUESTIONS.

WE WILL BE SEATED AT TABLES OF SIX (6) OR LESS FOR MANAGEABLE CONVERSATIONS.

YOU'RE WELCOME AND ENCOURAGED TO TABLE HOP.

 

The following was added by Tonya the group organizer:

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced.

I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well, you have transportation issues, you don't have the money, you just don't want to be around people or whatever the reason. My only request is for you to let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.

Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than hour before the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST contact me by calling or texting me at (617) 445-7549 or email at snowrover@yahoo.com

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first reserved basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If dinner is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP and if you answered the questions.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the dinner and you have not attended nor contacted me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update dinner confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within an hour of the dinner, without contacting me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events with reservations you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive at 6:45 PM to confirm seating and welcome you.

 

MBTA: Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS: Check out Google to plan your driving route

PARKING: Very limited parking at meters along Cambridge Street.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Muqueca dinner
